name: Pixel (Splitscreen)
description:
This is the first game I have ever uploaded.  please leave a comment on what you think was good, what you think should change, and what you think should be added.

                                                                                               

Controls:

W = Up 

A = Left

D = Right

Move forward and up to clime up walls. (some walls can't be climbed on)

If you have any questions please ask.
